name: Haircut Re-Cut
description:
Haircut Re-Cut is a game where you are the barber, you have 3 tools (ONLY FOR NOW (version 2.0.0)), One is the scissors, one is a trimmer, and the last is the hair dye, the difference between scissor and trimmer is the scissor cat cut large amounts of hair while trimmer can cut precisely. The people do not care even if you do not give the hairstyle they wanted, polite people!

|GLITCHES|

Cannot cut using scissor after using trimmer
